channel.title: Homes on Coleman R. Harris
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Coleman R. Harris

item.description: About Cole here. I am currently pursuing a variety of interests while a graduate student in the Department of Biostatistics at Vanderbilt University. I’m a University of Alabama - Tuscaloosa grad, born-and-raised Nashvillian, and dad to an amazing three-year old. My research interests sit somewhere in the realm of “big data” and “data science”. Currently, I’m working on issues related to cell imaging data. I also try on a bunch of other hats regularly: data scientist, freelance writer, science policy wonk, social media manager.
